title: Improve AI On Aram Bots
body:
Hi Guys

Now I know that there have previous been posts on this topic, and I am sorry if I am breaking a rule or doing something that is not allowed by bringing up the topic again. However, I feel that this is a legitimate problem that needs to be looked at. 

Although ARAM is a less popular game mode, it is still one that a lot of players find enjoyable. But too many times, a normal game of ARAM can be ruined by the prescene of bots.

Let me explain the problem. Often, there are not enough people wanting to play Aram, so riot fills the gaps by adding bots to the game. This is good in theory. However, the bots need to be within close skill range to normal players, which they currently are not.

To start off with, some bots will simply not leave the spawn until after minions spawn, meaning that the frequent fights that happen before this time can easily be won by the team with less bots. Sometimes, they even don't play the whole game, which is ridiculous. 

Bots generally start of with tier 2 boots and that's it. Not even some potions. This means that they will be considerably weaker than their opponents, disadvantaging their team. They then often like to build another pair of tier two boots. After this, they sometimes build ridiculous items for the champion they are playing. For example, I once had a lee sin bot on my team which decided to by archangels staff. Also, the bots will usually never buy components for items (such as a longsword when building into a phage), instead they will simply wait until they have enough gold to buy a full item, once again giving their team a large disadvantage.

Finally, the way bots actually play is also very bad. They usually simply run into the enemy team and suicide, giving free kills and gold. Obviously, pings will have no affect. Moreover, bots often don't play the champion itself very well, such as constantly missing skill shots and not participating in team fights. 

If you play a game of League Of Legends, you are dedicating a significant amount of time to it. It should not have to be wasted by playing in unfair games that are not fun for the real players.

In my opinion, the AI on ARAM bots needs to be significantly improved in order to provide an enjoyable playing experience for all players.  

Please post your opinions, I am interested in knowing other people's views on this matter.
